itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, October 11, 2013
title: Figuring out the numbers without the numbers
teaser: Trying to figure out economic data without official government statistics.
description: Trying to figure out economic data without official government statistics.
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

The government shutdown means no official economic data. But economist Chris Low tells Marketplace Morning Report Host David Brancaccio what we do know about back-to-school retail sales without the government's official report for September, or sales numbers from the nation's largest retailer, Walmart.

","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: The government shutdown means no official economic data. But economist Chris Low tells Marketplace Morning Report Host David Brancaccio what we do know about back-to-school retail sales without the government's official report for September, or sales numbers from the nation's largest retailer, Walmart.
